metadata.title: Usview Halloween Witch Costume Girl's Purple and Black Wicked Witch With Hat & Broom, Cute Princess Skirt Dress Up Deluxe Set
features: DELICATE AND SOFT MATERIAL - Our Halloween witch costume is made of 100% top-quality polyester, 100% non-toxic, and the environmentally friendly material brings a soft and delicate feel without peculiar smell. Stretching and shrinking, and wrinkle resistant. Safe for little kids to dress and wear. Comfortable material so your kiddo can focus on having fun during Halloween events, theater play, and more!

FAIRYTALE WITCH COSTUME DELUXE SET - Our adorable Halloween witch costume include a witch dress (long sleeve, layered falbala), a purple belt ( adjustable belt ), a witch hat and black witch broomstick (detachable and adjustable). All the accessories needed for a little witch are included, a lively little witch is dressed up. You are the prettiest witch on the trick-or-treat route when you are wearing this fancy witch costume!

CUTE LITTLE WITCH & PRINCESS DRESS STYLE - The girls witch dress is Halloween classic black and purple, cuffs and waist part have elastic, comfortable. Bubble sleeve design, covered with a lace layer, add a courtly and flamboyant atmosphere to this costume, is a little witch and also a quick-witted little princess! This girls witch costume with its style will definitely make your little one stand out from the crowd!

SUPER VALUE FOR HALLOWEEN ROLE PLAY - The Halloween witch costume set is very suitable for Halloween Dress Up Parties, Fairytale Witch Themed Parties, Children's Witch Costume, Cute Witch, Witch Costumes for Girls, Fairytale Costumes for Girls, Good Witch Costume for Girls, Halloween Costume Dress Up, Fairytale Witch Role Playing, Activity, Everyday Play and More! The girls witch costume set can also be used as a delicate gift for friends and relatives.

SUITABLE FOR GIRLS OF DIFFERENT AGES - Available in 4 sizes Small (3-4 yr),Medium(4-6 yr),Large(7-9 yr ),X-Large(10-12 yr). Suitable for young girls of different ages. These clothes are flexible, please follow our size chart to choose the corresponding size.Hand Wash Cold.Do Not Bleach. Easy to Wear, Unique Halloween Costume for Witch Role Play. Halloween Costume Contest Idea! Add Lots of Fun to Your Halloween Party and Other Theme Activities!
description: Fun to Your Halloween Party and Other Theme Activities!

This witch costume with its flashy courtly style will definitely make your little one stand out from the crowd! Detachable and Adjustable Witch Broom - The pole of the witch broom is detachable, the length of the broom can be adjusted flexibly, the tail of the broom is made of cloth and can be washed.Durable, reusable and not easy to break, the detachable handle allows you to store and carry easily, does not occupy much space. Role Play Choose - Girl witch costume is perfect for Halloween Dress Up Parties, Halloween Costume Dress Up, Fairytale Witch Role Playing, Activity, Everyday Play and More. Princess Dress Style - Bubble sleeve design, covered with a lace layer, ruffles on the chest to add a courtly and flamboyant atmosphere to this costume.And with sleeves and lace princess style, this witch dress is playful, cute and spooky, perfect for kids' halloween dress up. High-Quality Material - Made of high-quality material, 100% polyester, 100% non-toxic, eco-friendly, skin-friendly, soft touch and no odor,fairytale witch halloween party cosplay costume is safe for children.
